message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll see it as a worthwhile investment.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value this product brings justifies a higher price. Could you consider $17,000?
I understand the value of the product, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. Can we meet in the middle?
